section.heading: Definition of terms set forth in acts and resolutions.
section.text: For the purposes of any act or resolution of the Council of the District of Columbia, unless specifically provided otherwise:

para.text: The term “Council” means the Council of the District of Columbia established under § 1-204.01.
The term “Mayor” means the Mayor of the District of Columbia established under § 1-204.21.
The term “Act” means an Act of the Congress.
The term “act” means an act of the Council.
The term “District” means the District of Columbia.
